## Description {#details}

Define <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/macho/record">Record</a>.

They represent API&#39;s in binaries that could be linkable symbols.

Definition at line 67 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/textapi/record-h">Record.h</a>.
